name: Avoid the police
description:
This is a very fun escape game with a touch of parkour in it, providing a super realistic and dynamic experience. Players need to avoid the pursuit of police cars and escape through numerous obstacles, which has a certain difficulty.

The overall interface of the game is a green grassland and forest, allowing you to feel the vitality of spring. More special effects updates and details optimization, waiting for players to personally discover in the game. The character details are more exquisite, bringing you a new visual feast! Comprehensive optimization of route design, stronger game rhythm!


Diverse and exciting parkour gameplay, with flexible fingertips for micro manipulation, bringing more surprises;

Immersive gaming experience, free challenges, very exciting;

Exciting gaming experience, immerse yourself in it, constantly challenge and enjoy joy!




Operation mode


A=Move Left


D=Move Right


W=Jump
